record.description: University of Chicago Varsity Football Squad, 1938. Fourth row: G. H. Crandell, T. R. Gallander, R. P. McNamee, D. S. Wilson, W. A. J. Maurovich, W. K. Kurk, W. A. Kimball, T. P. Howe, and J. J Berwanger (assistant coach); third row: B. B. Wallis, C. C. Jamison, R. W. Jampolis, C. F. Banfe Jr., J. D. Stearns, J. R. Keller, D. R. C Scott, C. F. Nohl, L. C. Traeger, W. J. Ottomeyer, O. W. Crawford, J. K. Anderson (assistant coach), T. N. Metcalf (director), and W. Bock (assistant coach); second row: Ewald Nyquist (assistant coach) C. D. Shaughnessy (coach), Herbert Blumer (assistant coach), J. R. Howard, J. E. Bex, R. E. Wheeler, H. G. Hawkins, R. J. Parsons, R. W. Wasem, J. L. Davenport, R. B. Harlan, David Wiedemann III, J. P. Plunkett, W. H. Rendleman, and W. L. Littleford; first row: R. G. Sass, R. E. Meyer, E. H. Valorz, T. P. Fink, M. M. Goodstein, L. B. Hamity (captain), S. Sherman, R. E. Cassels, A. H. Tully, R. J. Greenebaum, and J. Loeb.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
